channel.title: Comments on: If you ever wonder why your team can’t push an objective in Breakthrough this is why. So many snipers I had to play sniper to end them. Yes we won. On sector one.
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: TheCommandeR66
item.dc:creator: TheCommandeR66
item.description: Ppl don’t seem to understand that u can’t take objectives from outside of it and defenders have unlimited tickets.
item.content:encoded: Ppl don’t seem to understand that u can’t take objectives from outside of it and defenders have unlimited tickets.

item.title: By: SteveTheSoviet
item.dc:creator: SteveTheSoviet
item.description: Same with armor. We’re getting smashed and I look back to see 3 Shermans on a hillside 300m off the objective
item.content:encoded: Same with armor. We’re getting smashed and I look back to see 3 Shermans on a hillside 300m off the objective

item.title: By: relpmeraggy
item.dc:creator: relpmeraggy
item.description: Damn it’s so juicy when they are all clustered together like that.
item.content:encoded: Damn it’s so juicy when they are all clustered together like that.

item.title: By: CryptographerNo9000
item.dc:creator: CryptographerNo9000
item.description: Nice. Yeah, what a fn annoyance.. wish there was a way to limit one to a squad max or something like a server setting.. wonder how 2042 is going to be!
item.content:encoded: Nice. Yeah, what a fn annoyance.. wish there was a way to limit one to a squad max or something like a server setting.. wonder how 2042 is going to be!

item.title: By: Devanomiun
item.dc:creator: Devanomiun
item.description: And none of them landing a shot, lmao.
item.content:encoded: And none of them landing a shot, lmao.

item.title: By: nerdmanjones
item.dc:creator: nerdmanjones
item.description: This is Aerodrome, but I had something similar on Hamada the other day and I'm pretty sure it was the most boring match I've ever played.
item.content:encoded: This is Aerodrome, but I had something similar on Hamada the other day and I’m pretty sure it was the most boring match I’ve ever played.

item.title: By: xSimoHayha
item.dc:creator: xSimoHayha
item.description: unpopular opinion but battlefield would be so much better without scout class
item.content:encoded: unpopular opinion but battlefield would be so much better without scout class

item.title: By: NOT_Silencerrr
item.dc:creator: NOT_Silencerrr
item.description: this makes me scared for the addition of armour in 2042
item.content:encoded: this makes me scared for the addition of armour in 2042

item.title: By: jman014
item.dc:creator: jman014
item.description: Ngl sniping in BFV is very overpowered. It can feel satisfying to go sans-scope as a sniper but quick scoping is just rampant in this game.
item.content:encoded: Ngl sniping in BFV is very overpowered. It can feel satisfying to go sans-scope as a sniper but quick scoping is just rampant in this game.
